title: Self-Directed Keystroke Dynamics-Based Certification System Design and Implementation

context.prior_knowledge: Basic understanding of machine learning concepts and foundational Python programming skills
context.additional_context: In a BYOD environment, learners collect and analyze keystroke data using personal devices and experience real-world authentication system development through VR simulations.

learning_goals: Can explain keystroke dynamics data preprocessing and feature extraction techniques
Students can compare and explain the advantages and disadvantages of filter-based and wrapper-based feature selection techniques
Students can implement a user authentication system using various machine learning classifiers and evaluate its accuracy
Students can perform a comparative analysis of authentication frameworks based on standard evaluation methodologies
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
